The 22nd of March 2024 marked 50 years since work began to construct the Itchen Bridge [@robertson1976; @nicholson1977].

Southampton Museums & Archive page on [the floating bridge](https://southamptonstories.co.uk/story/floating-bridge/) as part of their [Southampton Stories](https://southamptonstories.co.uk/) collection.

Song from 1977 the Woolston Ferry [Gutta Percher & Balladeers on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OemLggeF8PU) which references the Lowry painting.
